articles.author: Niomi Harris
articles.title: Caleb Landry Jones cuts a striking figure in a red pinstripe suit at the Nitram photocall at Cannes - Daily Mail
articles.description: The American actor, 31, stood out in a red and white pinstripe suit on Saturday while attending the Nitram photocall at the Cannes Film Festival.
articles.content:
He is best known for his roles in critically acclaimed movies such as The Florida Project, Get Out and Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri.
